attributes.action: Stop the Decriminalisation of Abortion in England and Wales: Protect the Unborn
attributes.additional_details: We believe this law is harmful as it removes vital safeguards and allows irreversible decisions to go unchecked. It diminishes the seriousness of ending a life and conflicts with the fundamental right to life, a right this law primarily denies unborn children.
attributes.background: We urge the government not to pass the abortion decriminalisation amendment. It removes legal safeguards, puts unborn lives at risk, and sends a harmful message about the value of life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Reverse Abortion Decriminalisation in England and Wales: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730690
